Fantastic food and service. All food is made at the time it is ordered (i.e., if you order a pasta dish the sauce is made at the time it is ordered).  Daily lunch and dinner specials are posted on their Facebook page.  Live music in the lounge on various Thursdays (dates posted on FB page).  Monthly and quarterly unique specially created cocktails.

We were just visiting Bismarck and a friend recommended this place. Service was exceptional. Menu was intriguing...food was excellent...you gotta love those signature Bloody Mary's..we will definitely be back next time we are in Bismarck.
One of the best places to eat in town for a nice meal.

name: MacKenzie River Pizza, Grill & Pub
reviews: Really good pizza! (Probably a good thing since they're a pizza place.) Has a cool wooden, outdoorsy atmosphere. I've never had any issues with my food and the wait staff is attentive. They also have a separate space for bigger parties. Would recommend for birthdays.

Honestly the best pizza i had in my life. NO JOKE!!! This place is always busy and always a wait. I happened to get in early on a Saturday and sat at the bar. Never been here before and asked what to order. I was recommend the pizza and wasn't disappointed. Quality ingredients!

Most of the food was Great. However I got the sliders and it was like 1 burger was half uncooked. While the other burger was cooked just right. However the place was very clean. I love the Pictures they have up on Canvas. Really enjoyed for the first time checking it out.
Excellent service. Wait staff (Peyton) in the bar went above and beyond. Highly recommend. Great food very reasonably priced.
Excellent selection of menu items. Great wait staff (a big shout out to LUKE). Very interesting decor.

name: Oahu Hawaiian BBQ Sushi Bar & Thai Cuisine
reviews: Great rolls.  Reasonably priced.  Try the Thai Fried Rice - moist and perfect.  Good service even if server was grumpy.  But then, so was the hostess.  In spite of the lack of welcome will go back.  Hope more appreciated next time.
Very good delicious I love this place people do a wonderful job

Haven't received our entrees yet,  but the shrimp shumai and calamari are both the best I've ever eaten at any restaurant. Beautiful and tranquil atmosphere with an extraordinarily friendly and attentive staff.  Pricing is also phenomenal for the high quality exotic foods!  First time here and it will certainly not be our last!

This is my edited review
I have been here quite a lot 😂✌️
Sushi taste really good!!!!
Drunken Noodle and Pad See u also really good!!
They have an award winning bartender there (Tony)!
The price is considered cheap, especially when it is a happy hour time. They have 2 cycle of happy hour. I forget about the first cycle, but the second cycle starts from 8:30 p.m till close, and It's a all day happy hour on monday!!

Fantastic tasting food and customer service. The lunch deals are definitely really good but the evening food prices are significantly higher. The BBQ chicken I ordered was $14 because it was 3:30, if I had shown up roughly 30 minutes earlier, I could have ordered it for $8. This is just a small issue, the rest of the experience was awesome. I would recommend giving this place a try but make sure to bring $16-17 per person.

name: Cracker Barrel Old Country Store
address: 1685 N Grandview Ln, Bismarck, ND 58503, USA
reviews:
Very well priced with many, many options.

They have everything from breakfast, lunch, and dinner available all day long. Some menu items are reserved for Fridays or Sundays, but you won't have to worry about not finding something you like. 

The store at the front of the restaurant has great items for the kids and adults that wish to find something nice. Great candy selection.

Pretty good home-cooked style food. Usually order the Country Boy b-fest for this hungry guy. The steak was good and juicy enough that I didn't need to add any extra sauce. Eggs came out just the way I wanted them. Warm biscuits with jelly were delicious. Hashbrown casserole was yummy. Fried apples are usually good too. Lines to pay can be a bit long.

Service: always amazing. Food: always amazing. Value: terrific. 
The only reason they did not get 5 stars today: the men's restroom was disgusting. Urine on the floor that was beginning to dry, feces on the toilet seat, and paper towels everywhere. I informed the hostess of the issue as I was being seated. I never went back to check; I used the gas station restroom after lunch.
My family and I love this place! Always good food and good service! And I adore the little store there with everything they carry!
The bigger the group. The slower the service. However, it's clean, the servers are friendly, reasonably priced food. And EXCELLENT biscuits.

name: Noodlezip
address: 208 E Main Ave #2, Bismarck, ND 58501, USA
reviews: The service is quick, the food expertly prepared, and it's always busy. Vegan options are available, too. This is one of our unique local places I recommend to anyone and everyone. Pictures are from their special Classic Chinese Gastronomy event.

Good place to get some Ramen & other types of Asian food. Place is a little small and largest tables are for two people. Price is a tad higher than other places I have tried in the state. Portions are smaller than others. Taste is superb and I will definitely be coming back to try other menu items. 1 appetizer and a entree with a drink was around $50 for 2 ppl. Staff was very friendly and service was great. Only reason its 4 stars instead of 5 is the price and space. I would highly recommend this place to my friends and family.

Good local restaurant. Food comes very fast. Almost felt like fast-food kind a fast. Seafood curry is unique, but high price. Maybe seafood are expensive here. Taste is okay if you want something new, I think it's good choose. Beef pho is good. Very tender. Spare rip is also good as well, Sauce is sweet  not juicy kind a rip. Korean BBQ sauce rip.

Amazing food! We had a short wait at noon, but every minute is worth it. We had several dishes, all amazing, dessert and we have leftovers.  One of my favorite places to eat! Service is friendly and accommodating.
We love the food❤ Awesome service😊 Friendly and helpful staff. We're glad we googled you, us being out of towners and all!! Thank you ❣

name: A & B Pizza
address: 1017 E Interstate Ave, Bismarck, ND 58503, USA
reviews: Thank you so much ! I live in MN and ordered a pizza for my mom in Bismarck! It was easy to do and arrived nice and hot! You made her day and made me feel better in these trying times!!

Just passing through town. This restaurant got recommended to us at the front desk of our motel. Good pizza. Cold beer. Hit the spot. Nice casual dining. If you're looking for something different than another burger, don't hesitate. Staff was very friendly.

House special is my husbands first love. I am his second. Wonderful locally owned pizza place! Highly recommend! 

Garden pizza is my personal favorite!
Better prices! No liquor license just beer, alright by me with a slice or... Well slices. Great staff very friendly for a lunch for by the slice pizza or burger and frys.
Awesome pizza. We had a meaty type. Delivery was on time and pizza was piping hot and scrumptious. Also they delivered to the Bismarck koa. Wonderful evening.

name: Famous Dave's Bar-B-Que
address: 401 E Bismarck Expy, Bismarck, ND 58504, USA
reviews: Best barbecue I have ever had!!! Great atmosphere. The staff were amazing! Ribs were fall off the bone, brisket melts in your mouth, light and fluffy corn bread. Highly recommend!!!!
We got the lunch special 2 meats. Was great and the food was cooked perfectly to each request.  Got the bread putting fur dessert and it served all of us at the table.

I decided to give them a second try because this chain usually has pretty decent service and food. Firstly, we sat for over 15 minutes before we got a server, then she came to our table with a really nasty disposition. That’s when we got up and left. No one service or food is THAT good where I am going to tolerate being treated that way as a customer.  From my previous review: Horrible food and service. Small portions on the catfish fingers.
Food was cold. Meat was overcooked and dry. Place was nearly empty during the lunch hour. Should have been a good indicator but I didn't catch it.

My coworkers and I went here for a team lunch and my personal experience was fine but there were some issues that happened to my coworkers. One of my coworkers got normal wings instead of boneless wings, the manager came by and started working on getting boneless wings done for him. They eventually came to the table with the platter of wings but they were the completely different flavor/sauce. My other coworker ran into another issue. The entire table had already finished eating except one person who had ordered at the same time and ordered the same food as someone who was done eating. This was brought up to the manager and the food was later made but the person had to scarf it down at the speed of light to eat it before the lunch ended. I used to love this place but it appears to be going down in quality. I would recommend other options if you're expecting a quick lunch without issue.

name: The Wood House Restaurant
reviews:
Recently I went through the drive thru. Ordered a Wood House wonder meal with no onions and a Coke. There was only one car ahead of me and I had to wait for a long time. When I was paying for the order the employee was wearing gloves, with which he took my money and preceded to cook the food while wearing the same gloves. Wow. Very sanitary. It took awhile for my meal and while leaving the drive thru I hit a big pothole and my Coke spilled onto the floor of my car. After this I tried to avoid the other potholes in the parking lot but couldn't avoid them all. On my way home the low tire light in my dash came on so I must have some kind of tire or rim damage from hitting all the big potholes. After heading home and having to clean the sticky mess up in my car I finally was going to eat my meal. But I had to pick my burger apart first as it had onions on it even though I specifically told them no onions. There were hardly any fries either.

Portions are small and the prices keep getting higher. Will NEVER come back again. Fix the parking lot, its pothole city. Not the same since the new owners took over.

This is the first time I've visited since the change of ownership. I was not disappointed.
I had the buffalo burger that was obviously hand-made from scratch, (not  a frozen machine made patty)....Delicious! Fries were also very good. This is the place to go if you just want great local home-style food where the service was fast and friendly.

This is the worst place I’ve eaten at so far. I ordered fried fish but was told they were out. So they gave me a fish sandwich that was bland and greasy.  We also ordered double cheese burgers. The meat was awful. And the bread was tough. You had to rip it apart to eat it. Don’t go here. I’d rather eat moldy fruit than eat here again.

This was the worst meal we have had when eating out in Bismarck. First time and last.  Would not recommend to anyone. Had a hamburger and onion rings , husband had Philly and onion rings.  Actually feel ill thinking about the food. Won't let me give 0 stars but that's what we give!
A Bismarck tradition.  Same good burgers & onion rings as I remember! Can't beat it. ❤

name: Yim Siam Thai Cuisine
reviews: Stopped by on my way through town. It's carry out only, so I ate in the car. It was very good. I'm a huge fan of Thai food, and always try to sample the local variants whenever I travel. Thanks for the great lunch!
Wonderful small take out place with picnic tables out back. The flavor of all the dishes were wonderful. So happy to have found this on our way to the parks.
I have only had masaman curry and fried rolls.  The curry had good flavor and aromatic seasoning.  Usually order ahead and it's done in 20 minutes or less.  Family owned.

The medium spicy Beef fried rice was amazingggg!! I also really liked the mangos & coconut rice. Mmmmmm 

Def a Thai food fan now.
I have had a lot of Thai food from a few different places in the country . These guys are the real deal! Authentic and my favorite.

name: Broadway Grill & Tavern
address: 100 W Broadway Ave, Bismarck, ND 58501, USA
reviews: Very nice place. We tried the firecrackers and buffalo meatballs for starters and they were both amazing appetizers. Then I ordered the filet with a sweet corn something for a side. They really know how to cook a steak, and the side was really good. The only reason I am not giving them 5 stars is because they know how to charge. This is not a place to go if you are on a tight budget.
we held an amazing birthday part for my mother. They were so helpful and the food was fantastic.

What a Great Experience‼️ We we’re Running about 20 Minutes Behind on Valentines Day Due to an Issue with Our Lyft Ride so Our Reservation was given away at One of Broadway’s Competitors .... Which We Understand That They had Other Customers to Serve. So I Googled Broadway Grill and Dalton  Answered the phone we told him about the situation we were in and asked if there’s any available tables he said he could get us in at 8PM which is only 35 minutes away.... So we Walked to the Broadway when we arrived we sat at the bar waiting for our table and we noticed a Table in the bar was open so we asked Dalton if he could be our server and we would just sit in the bar! All the Food and Drinks Were on Point..... Dalton Gave My Girlfriend and Myself an Awesome Valentines Dinning Experience‼️

3 of us had lunch here Mon Jan 27th. We waited an hour for our food and found our salads to b of poor quality and  not worth $6-chopped head lettuce, one tomato, and shredded cheese. Fish sandwiches were good but had to ask for the sauce. I dont know what happened to this place, it used to be very good quality food. Sure hope it improves!
LOVE LOVE LOVE the broadway! Great staff AMAZING FOOD! Highly recommend the fire crackers, guacamole and any salad! I love the broadways bloody Mary’s and house merlot. ❤️

name: Big Boy Restaurant
address: 2511 E Main Ave, Bismarck, ND 58501, USA
reviews: Just get in line! Wondering what to try? Get the Big Boy Original, flying style Pizza Burger or any of the chicken. If you're looking for something with a kick, get the boom boom sauce on the Big Chic and you'll be in for a treat. Don't forget the Frozen Coke or brown cow! The poppers are a nice addition to share with the family or friends.

Order is incorrect every single time. Line is usually backed up 2 miles down the street so no chance you’re going back through to get your missing $10 worth of food. Food is great. Order accuracy needs work. The consistency of mistakes is embarrassing and seems like something a business would work on. Apparently not. 1-2 stars.

Always wanted to try it and did today. Wife and I both agree a little to much bun and to thin of patty on the cheese burgers. Very courteous staff, and no complaints on fries or drink. The line was long when we pulled in but went pretty fast. Will most likely stop again and try something else from the menu, they have several options that look pretty good.
Can only be flying style!! "Amazing."  The chicken, and fries with gravy are delicious also.

Cool place! It's a Big Boy Restaurant strictly as drive through. We got the Pappy Parker's Fried Chicken and was not disappointed. They have a picnic area behind if you want to eat there. Will definitely go back

name: Charras
reviews: I truly enjoyed the restaurant, the service and the food.  Very authentic and lots of flavor.  The server was very attentive and helpful.  Our order was perfect and came out right away, in all everything was perfect.  The prices are reasonable considering that you are getting the real deal.  I will definitely recommend this restaurant to anyone who wants to enjoy real mexican food.  I'll be back again soon.  Thank you.

Great everything.  Say yes to the groc!!!!  Yesterday, onions were overpowering so you may want to leave out onions, just in case.  Didn't keep us from finishing bowl... One serving enough for at least four.  Good-Very Good Salsa.  Chips excellent.  Service perfect.  Entrees Very Good.  Tacos most delicious.  Enchiladas two thumbs up.  On a scale of 1-10, with 10 being Authentic Mexican this is a solid 8.5, just missing a 9.
Love the atmosphere! The food is the best. Love the fresh guacamole made table side. The food is served sizzling hot! Don’t touch the plate! The margaritas were so good!

You can judge a Mexican restaurant by their home-made salsa. They have a very tasty salsa. So I had no doubt that the rest of the meal was going to be great. Guacamole made right at the table. Mexican food with great flavor and taste. Great house Margherita too!  Go, right away!
Excellent food, excellent margarita, freshly made guacamole at your table. Chips a little too salty. Very friendly and fast service. Great atmosphere.

name: EAT Thai Cafe
reviews:
Consistent excellent quality food and portions. Visit once and try a Curry - you'll be hooked on this restaurant.
Ordering online is a breeze and gives you an expected order will be ready wait time. (Usually around 30-45 minutes at dinner time). Add those Spring rolls to your dinner 👌

Yummy! The egg noodles so good!  Loved the satay! Everything was so fresh! It is located in a transformed home, plenty of parking behind the business, wheel chair ramp, outdoor seating. Sit down dining to accommodate about 24 people.

This place is awesome. Super good customer service, always friendly, and the food is bitchin. My wife loves the pad Thai, and if you h want tried their wings yet, so yourself a favor, get on that website, order up some spicy Thai wings, and watch out for that level 4 spice, ‘cause it’ll get you. Excellent restaurant. We have been 3 times, and have been incredibly satisfied. During the COVID19 pandemic, they’ve been super accommodating and flexible, making curbside super duper easy. 6/5, would recommend.

This was our first time dining at Eat Thai. The service was phenomenal. The Thai teas had an amazing flavor. We ordered the Pad Thai with homemade peanut sauce, the Thai Pork and the spring rolls. Portion size was giant enough to bring home lunch for the next day. Delicious !

I usually eat authentic thai food in my home town Jakarta Indonesia, and several asia country including Bangkok Thailand. The food here amazingly taste pretty close to the authentic one. I try the Pad Thai and Drunken Noodle. I will come back again to taste the other menu, and give u guys better review.

name: Jack's Steakhouse & Seafood
reviews: I love this place. Everything I've ever gotten has been fantastic. It's clear they  take pride in making every thing as good as possible. Down to the condiments and the minor things like fries.

Ordered the Steak and Lobster.  The lobster was cooked perfect but the steak was a very poor cut and over cooked.  Only received 1 of my 2 side items.  Waitress was very courteous though and discounted the steak from the bill and packaged my 2nd side item up to go!!  I'll return again and give Jack's another shot!!
Pretty good food. For the price should have gotten a little more food than what you get. The wait staff was ok but felt aloof. All and all it wasn't bad.

I had a great experience at Jacks a couple weeks ago on a business trip. First I was late getting in and they were wrapping up. I ordered a medium rare prime rib and it was pretty over cooked. When the manager stopped by to ask how I was I asked what she thought and she completely agreed and was quite gracious but of course that late in the day didn’t have any more MR prime rib. She offered me a medium rare ribeye to replace it, was super apologetic and very gracious as was my server. Bottom line, you don’t have to be perfect if you make it right. I was exhausted and getting my first really good meal in a while. They made it good when it could’ve been bad. Five stars for making it right! Good food and excellent service!
Jack's steakhouse is known for their special shrimp sauce and baked shrimp and of course they're settling 1241 Wednesdays two-for-one burgers on Thursdays

name: Space Aliens Grill & Bar
address: 1304 E Century Ave, Bismarck, ND 58503, USA
reviews: This is my first time traveling to Bismarck for business and someone at my hotel mentioned the Space Aliens Grill. I figured I would give it a try and I'm glad I did! This was a fun experience that I wish I could have shared with my family. The menu alone was entertaining to read through. The decor was great. One of the best themed restaurants I've ever been to!

Molly, our server was outstanding. The Outerspace blooming onion was delicious, crispy and not greasy. The wings had a good tangy sauce, made your nose tingle even. Had the Taco burger, wasn't too bad I suppose. Both side salad options were very good. The atmosphere of course was what always sells the place. The music this time was pretty good too, a nice mix, some prog rock classics like Rush and Yes and more modern.

The BBQ can be quite good here. That said the quality can be very hit or miss.Sometimes the ribs are right on; sometimes dry and clearly sitting around too long. They have good pizza and offer good Gluten free pizza. The staff usually have noticably good attitudes. The game room for kids is just way too overpriced its gotten kind of bonkers over the years. Being a BBQ place you'd think they would have paper towels in the bathroom but they don't -- it's hand dryers only. Always made me feel like they're cutting corners.

I loved this place!  This is something I would expect to find in New Mexico or Nevada; but Bismarck, North Dakota?  Nevertheless, I was so glad to have stumbled across it during our one night stay in Bismarck.  Apparently, there are currently 3 locations across North Dakota and Minnesota.  The entire atmosphere inside is very unique with really cool decor and memorabilia.  The food was fantastic with many dishes having alien themed names.  There is also an arcade in back with a pretty nice selection of games.  Overall, this place is awesome for kids and fun-loving adults alike!

I was very disappointed. I went in and was seated, the only one there. The server came over and got my drink order, it was delivered, then got my meal order, she brought the salad and almost immediately  brought my meal. I hadn't even gotten a chance to start eating my salad. Of course then my meal was cold. I felt very rushed. The food was fairly good. I also noticed the server never did smile. Things like that are important to me.

name: Bistro 1100
address: 1103 E Front Ave, Bismarck, ND 58504, USA
reviews: Had big group, probably 30 people. Service was good and portions were very large. Great overall experience.

Came with my special lady... ordered a beer and her a foo foo drink. Manager was bartender at this time. This was due to my timing, arriving between lunch and dinner. Still great service, just enough, and the food was delicious. Had the lobster bisque and lobster and 4 cheese ravioli, was very good and creamy. Just like it should be... 😉 good job guys, keep it up, and I’ll be back!

Recommended by a friend. Suggested a tasty drink from Laughing Sun Brewery next door, followed by lunch at Bistro 1100. Did not disappoint. My waitress suggested the bruschetta burger lunch special - 10oz of beef smothered in aioli with thick-cut bacon on a toasted bun (I forget what kind). Most burger patties taste similar, but this one was flavorful and smooth as BUTTER - not grainy like some. Awesome service and a great atmosphere.
Best place to eat in town. It's been my from the time I moved here 6 years ago and it's still my favorite.
Hamburger was great! Had a waitress in training that did an excellent job at making sure we were taken care of. Definitely will return!

name: Shogun Japanese Steakhouse, Sushi & Thai
reviews: Great stop as we were traveling through. Great happy hour sushi rolls. Lucky for us we walked in just before 4pm and snagged several of those.  Also delightful large bowls of noodle soup (which will be awesome to stop for again in winter road trip months!)

This is our favorite place for hibachi. The chefs do such a great job at being entertaining while making amazing food. I finally tried them for lunch because I love pad Thai and it did not disappoint. My husband also loved his bento box. I definitely recommend this place if you want to make a big deal out of your birthday. You don't get much for freebies but you definitely get a show!

Our food is always delicious and they offer a wide variety of dishes. My husband and I have visited for hibachi several times as well as traditional lunch/dinner dishes and we've never been disappointed. Definitely the best sushi in Bismarck!
The sushi and hibachi are always delicious! Always clean with great customer service.
my all time favorite place to eat! great food with many options and friendly staff.

name: Texas Roadhouse
address: 1505 Burnt Boat Rd, Bismarck, ND 58503, USA
reviews: Their streaks were fantastic. The service was excellent, out waiter had our drinks and food out so fast. He was so attentive to anything we needed. We will definitely be going back. This was overall a better experience that what we had at Peacock Alley (a way more expensive restaurant with not a good of steaks)
Excellent steaks and service. Order is quick and arrives as ordered. Nice specials. Excellent rolls.

The waitress was wonderful. I had the sirloin strip 8 oz. which was cooked perfectly at medium rare. However my wife who had the same steak sirloin had to have it cooked twice. First it was over cooked at well done. (She wanted medium well) then secondly it was nearly still rare!!! I guess third time is a charm huh?

Friendly staff, very attentive. Steak was done medium, just the way I requested. Shrimp was great. Hot buns with cinnamon butter, yum. The blooming onion, sorry, can't remember what it was called on menu, just right. Sauce for onion was excellent. What else can I say, GREAT place.
Excellent service. Delicious food. 👍🏻 I’ll be back for sure. Love the free bread&tons of peanuts. 😂

name: Los Lunas A Taste of New Mexico
address: 108 N Mandan St, Bismarck, ND 58501, USA
reviews: Good chili relleno; battered just right and the pepper was prominent over the batter. Place is attractive but echo-y due to high industrial ceilings. Our server was very good especially as it seems she was the only one on the dining floor.
Good food , tasty. The server was friendly. Good experience.

I can’t say enough good things about this excellent restaurant! This is REAL authentic New Mexican food!! In addition to delicious food, the service was great and very friendly! We can’t wait to go back when we are in Bismarck!
Pretty good atmosphere and the food is pretty tasty nothing fancy but simple things that are perfect don’t need to be
Chimi was good, staff was nice. Recommends by locals.  Co-worker and myself both enjoyed out meals.

name: Anima Cucina
reviews:
I got a caramel roll, which had a nice surprise of icing on it. I thought it was smooth and creamy as a dish. My wife had a molasses scone and she thought it’s a bit heavy on the ginger, but the texture was fantastic. Keeping in mind yeast breads  are difficult to master, and for the most part they did a good job.

We both had americanos and they both were very very good. Not a lot of acidity which I appreciate.

I love the atmosphere. Great vibe to the place. My wife says retro rustic.

Overall a good experience and we will be back to try more of the fare.

I love to stop at Anima Cucina and enjoy a latte or glass of wine while also taking in some much needed sunlight! It is a very relaxing atmosphere, and always smells of the freshly baked bakery items. Highly recommend!

Great selection of wines and cheeses, not at all something that I expected to find in downtown Bismarck, North Dakota. Their menu is somewhat pricey of you're going for a meal, but is perfect if you're wanting to sample a wide array of meats or cheeses. They do also offer a selection of vegan meats and cheeses, which was appreciated by one of the people in our group.

Such an enjoyable lunch! The food was delicious and I love the self serve aspect. I ordered the muffalata and the veggies in case the sandwich wasn't enough.  The sandwich was so much bigger than I expected! I can't wait to go back to try some of the wine on their extensive list!

Delicious fresh-baked breads that's all made by hand, meat and cheese boards, coffee, hot plates and sandwiches. A little pricy but excellent. And the tiramisu is excellent. Oh, and it's Italian and French.

name: Blarney Stone Pub- Bismarck
address: 408 E Main Ave, Bismarck, ND 58501, USA
reviews: We stayed in Bismarck one night and found this pub with zero regrets. The service at one of the bars with Andy was exceptional, beer choices galore and food  to die for. Genuinely the best fish n chips I’ve ever had! My husband thoroughly enjoyed his Corn beef and creamed cabbage. We will definitely be back next time we’re in Bismarck, this pub is a must!

Highly recommended from frequent visitor. Food quality is one of the best in Bismarck. Bangers & Mash (pictured) is my favorite meal here. Best brunch in town if you want a drink to go with it. Eggs Benedict are wonderful and I love the build-your-own Bloody Mary bar. Wish they had more burger options and would bring back their eating challenge. I've enjoyed almost every food item I've ever ordered here including Boneless Wings, Sandwiches, Shepherd's Pie, sweet potato fries, etc. Their Blarney dip is out of this world. Atmosphere is overall wonderful, although sometimes feels a little too dark. Love coming here to watch sports. Service is very attentive, sometimes almost too attentive. Great team of employees there - they do a great job making you feel welcome. Surprised that more people don't go here.

This shop itself is really beautiful! This place is amazing! They took me in last minute with no hesitation and accommodated to my indecisive self. All the employees are so friendly. Extremely clean and great! This is definitely going to be my GO TO spot!
Kilkenny Cod with lemon-garlic sauce on top of wild rice is a great alternative to fish and chips!  Very nice.
One of my favorite places to eat at in Bismarck. Good, hot food, great service. The place does get very noisy.

name: La Enchilada
reviews: As a Texan, this is the best Mexican restaurant I've had up North. Great food and service.
The food was unique. Not your cookie cutter Mexican food with plenty of flavor.  Definately a return visit.
Best service and food!! We are always treated well and the food is always fresh! Thank you so much to all the staff for the great hospitality! We plan to keep coming back!!

Great Authentic food! This is our new favorite place to go eat when we are in Bismarck. The guacamole and chips are to die for!! (I wish I could have the recipe, lol) Also, awesome service and great atmosphere.

I called to find out what time it stayed open. I was told 9pm. I arrive at 7:45pm and it was closed by the time arrive at 8pm. The Friday that I tried to eat at your restaurant. The doors where locked and the lights where off. Next time I'll take photos and post with comment if I ever go back.

name: Ground Round Grill & Bar
reviews: Mini sliders are great. Fast service with accurate orders. Love their Chicken Alfredo pasta. Stir fry was good too
First time ordering for delivery. Ordering was very  easy.The driver was here within minutes of stated delivery time. Food was warm and delicious. I'll do this again.
Service was great food was hot and delicious! Manager stopped at multiple tables to chat. Great place to eat
Thanks for the great carry out meal! We were so surprised with the popcorn and the message, your right we will get through this! ❤️❤️❤️
Food is really good. Big portions! But prices were a little high. Service was great.

name: Nardello's Pizza
address: 1001 W Interstate Ave, Bismarck, ND 58503, USA
reviews: This place is awesome. New York style slices and the $5.50 two slice and a drink combo is a stellar bargain. If you've never eaten here definitely try it.
Hands down best pizza joint in Bismarck
Great food and very friendly service! Very authentic New York style pizza! Highly recommended!
Good food. Friendly staff. Clean. Well priced. Will return
Delicious pizza, solid Italian hoagie sandwiches and the best (only?) street-style Philly cheese steak sandwich in town.

name: China Star
reviews: I had a pleasant experience at this restaurant.  The food was fine,  similarl to most Chinese buffets.  The restuarant was inviting and clean.  I like the arrangement.  The server was okay.  I tried to have a conversation with her, but she was unable to communicate in English.  We enjoyed the sushi bar.
Food was great! Service was great! Yes, I got Salmon Nigiri each time, even with dessert! Short walk from hotel. I'll definitely come back next time I'm in Bismarck!

SO GOOD! Snow shrimp is the BEST I have ever had in the country...well, I have never eaten or seen snow shrimp anywhere else. But MM MM MMMMMMMMMMMM. Its not low fat but it tastes amazing. Great customer service all the times I went. Sushi bar also. Lots of food choices to choose from.

I rarely ever leave written reviews, but if I can prevent some poor soul from wasting their money on this over-priced place, I will.  The only reason I give this place one star is because the people were nice.  But that is the only positive thought I can give.  The food was horrible.  The sushi tasted like it had been made the day before and was left out until I put it on my plate.  Dry rice, warm fish sashimi isn't supposed to be warm).  I thought I would fare better with the standard Chinese food they have on offer. But even that was subpar, and greasy even by Chinese food standards.  The staff, while nice people, we're not very good at their jobs. The couple in front of me came to their table and saw that I had not been wiped down and when they requested to have it cleaned, the lady leading them to their table pulled a few napkins out of the napkin box and wiped it off. At the end of the day, they double charged me.  They corrected it, The refund will take three to five business days to take effect. It's not going to break my bank, but it is irritating that I'd have to do that for a simple Chinese meal. For $16.50 for a drink and meal, I feel like I was cheated just a little bit. I don't mind paying that much for a Chinese buffet, but it has to be better than what I encountered last night at this restaurant. hopefully the owners of this restaurant will read this, and make the corrections necessary to make this place better..
We LOVE this place! The food selection is always good and ive never been unsatisfied.  The whole family like it. I always recommended it to friends.

name: Luckys 13 Pub
reviews: Great food with a good atmosphere. The turkey melt and burgers are very tasty. Our service was great and staff were helpful. They have a separate room to book for special events as well. Tuesday night they had bingo at 7 pm.

Great spot, the bar tender bought me a drink when I was down and out... And the rest of the team took great care of me. Drinks may be a little more, but the service goes above and beyond. Location is fantastic by the mall, and right accros from the hotel I was staying at for a few weeks. Maybe not the place to have 5 drinks, but 1 or 2 seems to be the ticket. The food is great, and that atmosphere is fantastic. Old world look with flame lighting, and cans powered by belts... See photos. Banquet capability, the first night I stopped in, the manager let me have a few left over burgers from an event as well... Abasalutly worth the extra few bucks, as you get what you pay for with almost anything.

The place looks neat on inside, although the A/C is a little too high. The TV placement is a bit odd and makes it difficult to get a great view no matter where you sit. Some of the food there is delicious. The boneless wings here taste awesome and so does the pulled pork flatbread. The nachos come in good portions - I got the quarter size and you can see the size in the picture. Service to take our food order once we were ready seemed slow. The food came out quite fast.

Very cool Irish pub atmosphere and the food is great, plus free popcorn. Only hitch is the price, which may make it an unattractive lunch option as an entree + beer can easily get to $25-30. If you're going with a group for dinner or looking for atmosphere then look no further.

Excellent! Had the Stacked Club, fresh fruit and a side salad for myself. Needless to say I only ate half of my club it was so huge! Gluten free menu is awesome, best menu I have seen in a restaurant lately. Boyfriend felt like he had a real meal for once. He had the Brie & Bacon burger with fries. Burger bun is gluten free and pretty tasty, fries are cooked in exclusive fry only fryer so he was able to have them. Definitely one of our go to places for gluten free options in Bismarck!

name: Bruno's Pizza
address: 910 E Front Ave, Bismarck, ND 58504, USA
reviews:
Great locally owned pizza place! I enjoy so many creative pizzas on the menu here. Mashed potato pizza, Alfredo deluxe pizza. YUM!!!!

Highly recommend

Really great food. We came for the calzone special and built our own. There were a lot of choices and we created some masterpieces. The service was great. Our server was nice and the food was quick. We came after the lunch rush and it was quiet. Great service and food!
The best gluten free supreme pizza I have had, and delicious grilled chicken salad. Definitely recommend!!!😊😀

During the virus lockdown we recently ordered a large 3 meat pizza and parm bites.  It was delicious as usual!!  Plus, they were super fast and even had free delivery during these crazy times so even better!

Used to be great. But theve cut costs without cutting prices and I can tell. And honestly the food is miserable I got a Delux meatball calzone (spegetti and meatballs with cheese  in a calzone)  
The  spegetti has practically no sause,  the cheese was all in one spot, the crust is burnt and the meatballs were still frozen in the middle.

name: La Tejana Mexican Market & restaurant
reviews: This place is INCREDIBLE!! Their posole is the BEST!  The owners care! I can't find a better Mexican restaurant in NORTH DAKOTA  let alone Bismarck! They can cook for me every night!! Thanks La Tejana!!
Such a unique place. The food was delicious and the service was so friendly and prompt!

Amazing authentic Mexican food!! The owner is so nice!! She is so kind and always makes time to talk to everyone! The food is always fresh and the portions are very generous! I absolutely recommend this place to EVERYONE!!!

HANDS DOWN BEST MEXICAN FOOD IVE HAD SINCE I LEFT SAN DIEGO MOVED OUT HERE TO NORTH DAKOTA ITS NOT OUTRAGEOUSLY  EXPENSIVE STAFF WAS SUPER FRIENDLY I LOVE HOW THE PLACE HAS A HOMELY INVITING FEEL TO IT.  I WILL DEFINITELY BE MAKING THIS SPOT ONE OF MY REGULAR PLACES TO GO TO.
This is a go to place to eat if you are craving great authentic food.  If you are in Bismarck you have to stop here.  You won't be disappointed!

name: Ale Works
reviews: The food is good and the in-house beers are excellent! The service was a bit lacking, but not terrible. I had their bacon cheese burger on my most recent visit, and it was very good. I highly recommend it. For a side dish I ordered the horseradish coleslaw. I liked the flavor, but it was a bit dry for me. I like my slaw a bit creamier, but it was still good.

Very very good. We came here for Sunday brunch (our second time). First time was excellent, and the second time didn’t fail to impress for the most part.

I had chicken (which was home battered and fried, not frozen) and bacon waffles with a brunch syrup. The waffle was dry towards the end due to its density.

My picky eater devoured her pecan waffles and said, “I want more.”

My wife and other daughter each had an egg tart (think scramble in a puff pastry shell).  The highlight was the house-made sausage featured in the dish.
Three of the meals came with a side of “fresh fruit”.  contrary to common thought, frozen or canned fruit with a sour, spicy taste is not fresh.  They would have preferred an orange wedge or 1/2 a banana.

Orange juice was fresh and little pulp. 

The service was slow and spotty. We often waited long periods before our waiter Tyson to check on us, see if we needed anything, or even to take care of our bill. The place was not even close to being packed so I don’t know what the hold ups were.

Overall a nice Sunday brunch place for Bismarck, just disappointed in the wait service.

Excellent food and drink selection. The poutine is delicious! Love the atmosphere and decor. Be prepared to pay for the quality as it isn't an inexpensive meal. 2 entrees, an appetizer, and 2 non alcoholic drinks will cost about $50

Excellent vibe and awesome place for drinks. Above average place for food. Great variety and quality of drinks at reasonable prices. The food is a little pricey. The jaeger schnitzel is highly recommended and delicious. Some of the other food options didn't look or sound as good. The chicken pot pie has a great presentation. Not a fan of pretzels coming as a side on one of the dishes someone got. Wish they had larger water glasses instead of the shot-sized ones.

Clam chowder was delicious! Tried the poutine but prefer a brown gravy instead of their twist on the gravy. But all in all the poutine was good. Ordered the club sandwich and was very tasty! I had ordered the Browned Butter Old Fashioned which was also quite tasty. We went there around 1pm and it was kind of busy and our service was good. Waitress checked in multiple times and even boxed our food up for us. Overall a good experience.

name: China Garden Restaurant
address: 1929 N Washington St V, Bismarck, ND 58501, USA
reviews: Out was great. I recommend the broccoli beef, orange chicken, wonton soup, and the egg rolls. Quiet place to sit down enjoy each others company and relax. Food is priced every low the for portions given. I love that part of the restaurant. Plus the FOOD IS AMAZING IN MY BOOK.

Never order before closing. Looked at the reviews and took the plunge. Beige was the color of all. Literally same sauce for garlic beef, Mongolian beef and orange chicken. Upcharge fried rice was bland and lacked any vegetables at all. I understand catering to the American palate, and I understand this is North Dakota.... But this is insulting... Also, battered dipped eggrolls ... My heart cries (as an aside, the staff was polite upon pickup... Offering plates and napkins.
Great place good food, picked up food tonight and this sign was on the door. I will be going back here when this is all over.

Outstanding food and polite, fast service. If you are a fan of hot and sour soup this one is packed with flavor and all the good ingredients. The Hunan chicken is very authentic and absolutely delicious. I highly recommend.
Excellent food and service. Always a pleasure to to take our guests there to eat.

name: Olive Garden Italian Restaurant
reviews: Great food and great drinks. If you like Italian food, you could try this place and possibly find a new favorite. They also have a wide selection of drinks to enjoy.

I placed order on line and during check out, my order date got changed. I called Bismarck store, a very pleasant voice answered. Long story short. The food was some of the best we have had. A great appreciation for you and your staff. Nicole was the young lady who made it possible. Kudos to the chef, most excellent pasta

Typical chain, and typical of this chain. It’s always clean. The wait staff is ALWAYS professional. Like this place only hires and demands the best - it really is on a level with some of the finer dining I’ve experienced. I’d be shocked if I ever went in there and even had a waitress that was disinterested, let alone rude. Best team in town.

The food - I mean nothing bad when I say it’s just average American Italian food. That’s fine, it’s why I’m there. It’s not over the top amazing like it was made by a master chef, because it’s not - it’s chain restaurant recipes that work, but don’t wow.

I have been going to olive garden for over 25 years.  The Bismarck location provides the best service of any I have ever been to.  Megan was a fantastic server and worked hard to go above and beyond throughout the meal.

Obviously most food is fake vs real like it was 25 years ago regardless of where you go to eat.  Fake food all tastes about the same because it is all high fructose corn syrup.  Real food would make the meals cost 2-3x more than they do.  So it kinda is what it is.  There is no way they can keep the prices the same today as they were 25 years ago and use real food.

So that aside, the service from everyone was incredible.   From the greeter to the server, manager, dish clearing staff, food delivery...all of them we extremely friendly, happy, upbeat and together provided a very pleasant dining experience.
What a great experience yesterday. I have come. Of. Course multiple times. Yesterday's service was great. The food was on point. And that pumpkin cheesecake.

name: JL Beers
reviews:
Awesome every time. All of the staff are so friendly. I don't know any of them personally but they are always nice and want to serve you. I feel welcomed every time I'm there. The food is consistently really good. The beer has always been good. The facility is really clean.
SHOUT OUT: outstanding job to the men and women of JL Beers
had a great evening, service was on point! Had a couple JL Burgers and Loaded Fries with a few beers! Excellent Experience once again!

Quaint little pub. Ordered the BBQ bacon burger. Excellent. We also ordered the loaded fries. Also excellent. I recommend you take home at least a pound of the fresh peanut butter for later. 
Service was fast and friendly.
Prices are affordable.

Found this restaurant and bar while on vacation and made stops at in numerous States any time we saw it it was a definite definite stop. The food service is always open late and they offer free hot pretzel after a certain hour with drink purchase to ensure that you can sober up and get home safely. I definitely recommend the peanut butter burger it sounds odd but it is amazing.
Food was GREAT.  Craft beer was wonderful. Service was awesome.  Best part? 2 of us had an app, 2 burgers n fries, 2 beers, a lemonade, and it was $52.  Definitely a new favorite stop.

name: The CraftCade - Pizza, Arcade, & Bar
reviews: Absolutely love this place -- they have a retro 80s theme. It brings back great memories from the 80s as well as of good old Snoopers Bump and Tilt from when I was a kid. Lots of good arcades all free-to-play. Their craft beer wall is really neat where you get a card and server yourself. That said, it seems like it always has a little too many fruity drinks for my taste but I can usually find something good. The food is phenomenal I highly recommend their "Predator" pizza. That's the meat-lovers. On Sundays they open the place up to kids all games still free! Adults can still get beer from the gated in beer wall as long as you get a bracelet.

Great entertainment, good pizza, and large beer selection. Been here twice so far and will be back. Go at off-peak hours for best experience. Tried to go once when it was packed and don't think it would be as fun. Pizzas are large and loaded with toppings, and they'll do half one way and half another which makes it easier to choose from the list of awesome pizzas. Great selection of games from 80's-90's.

Some patience required. Games take a beating in this environment and both times I've been there have been some games/controllers broken or not working properly. There are plenty of options and it seems like they try to stay on top of maintenance. 

The self serve beer wall is neat and convenient. Only downside is if a tap starts sending foam, which happened to us on a couple taps tonight. Not sure how they meter it but it's charged by the ounce, so disappointing to get a glass full of foam that would usually be the bartender's problem.

Beer and food is maybe slightly more expensive than other places but not by much, and it is well worth any difference for the gaming options.

Absolutely love this place!  Great atmosphere, great food, great music, great beer selection, and last but not least fun games!  It has everything you need for a fun night out with friends!  The takeout is great as well.  They have some of the best pizza in town!

This place is a great addition to Bismarck. A place for 21+ only that has old school arcade games was much needed and this place delivers in this area. The service at the food counter was great too.

Now for the negatives. The music is sometimes way too loud and makes it difficult for people to chat. Just wish it could be larger and allow for more games. Thus, this place is best attended when fewer people like on a weeknight. On a weekend night, it can be difficult to find open games to play. The place is small and thus doesn't have much seating availability for busier nights.  I tried the Chicago style dog, which had a great presentation, but the taste was just ok. Also, not a fan of the pretzel side - I wish there were other sides to choose from. Tried the Roadhouse pizza - the flavor of it tasted great but there was hardly any chicken on it - the bread ratio was too high compared to everything else.
It was a nice flash back to the 80's. I enjoy a teen wolf, a hot dog loaded with chili, Doritos and a lot of yummyness. It was radical!

name: Stonehome Brewing Company
reviews: Atmosphere would get a 5 star. Love the classic 80s/90s music. Beers here are good, but they were out of several. Some of the food is very delicious such as their pork belly tacos, jalapeno popper pizza, and fries. Some of the other food is just so-so and lacks flavor. The food is rather pricey. Great place to watch a game. Wait times to get seated are unusually long despite plenty of empty seats. Hopefully they can get more servers.

Love Stonehome! It’s nice to see friendly and consistent faces when I eat there for lunch and the nighttime atmosphere is hopping too. I don’t drink beer, but they have a great selection of wines and of course mixed drinks. I think the best thing is their rotating pizzas of the week. I don’t like to deviate and try things new, but this is an easy way for me to branch out. Who would have known I’d like artichokes on pizza?!
Great spot.  Looks really fancy has a good tap list.  Right next to a bank for some reason.  Like you gotta enter though the bank.
Amazing atmosphere,  wait staff on point and food is phenomenal, beer is just an extra. Found a new Bismark must!  Thank you for an awesome family dinner

Good food. Loved the pretzel and candied bacon (delicious)! The Rusty Tractor pizza had tasty toppings and an even better crust. Fish and chips were near perfect! The fish was light and flakey with flavorful batter and was not overly greasy. Loved the house made tartar sauce! Only reason I didn't give it 5 stars- service was a little slow but not terrible. Overall, worth the time and money.

name: Five Guys
address: 1001 W Interstate Ave, Bismarck, ND 58503, USA
reviews: Good food. Prices are a bit high but it seems that's happening everywhere. I like the fries when they're crispy. Have gotten them a little undercooked before. Burgers are good 95% of the time. Nice place for a greasy craving
Just tried it for the first time. It was a little high priced, but so worth it!
Best fast food burger in Bismarck but you pay for it. My family purchased 4 burgers, 1 large fry and 4 cups of water for $37. We were all full and happy though
Had frys... good frys. Staff need better work mentality.  Dirty floors, full trash cans and dirty tables

Great food, awesome service. Food is always fresh and great tasting. Best burgers around. Cost is a little more but you get what you pay for. A small burger is almost an inch thick patty. A regular burger is 2 beef patties together. Melts in your mouth. Any stopping you can think of and made fresh right in front of you. By far the best burgers I've ate in Bismarck, ND.

name: Applebee's Grill + Bar
reviews: Service was terrible.  First of all,  it was New Years eve.  I get it!   Had to wait to be seated, only to look at many open tables, stacked a foot high with dirty dishes, throughout restaurant and bar area.  Finally got seated and order was taken. It took forever to get order only to have  food ice cold. There was 2 of us, both ordered the all you can eat special.  Both reordered more shrimp,wings and same old story, cold food. How can you make customers wait that long only to serve cold food?  I cannot rate this visit very high and it will take a while before I return to Applebee's North Bismarck ND
The servers here were so polite and caring, they even took my order 5 minutes before closing time. We will certainly come back again when we are in the area. Thank you again!
Used to have sketchy employees but seems much better now. Food was good. Need to get some craft beers!

Just went last night for the school fundraiser night. We had to pre-register for the event and then ordered and paid online and gave name and vehicle description 1 hour before we planned to pick up. We arrived on time and checked in using their texting system. We waited 1 hour before anyone even came to our car to ask our name.  After 2 hours we went to find out what was taking so long. 30 minutes later the manager told us that our food had been given to someone else. We were offered a refund or to wait for our food to be made. We chose the refund as we didn't want to spend more time waiting.
Great food, service, staff, location and price.

name: Rock'n 50's Cafe
reviews: I always get great service here. Great food options and I'm only at the tip of the iceberg. Also, great drinks to go with your meal.
The diner itself was very cute. Nice staff. Just wish the food was a little better.
They have the best fries and the best shakes! Their knoephla soup is great too
The 50s and 60s music along with the decor from the time frame made this a perfect trip thru time. I had a james dean burger which was done perfectly and the waitress was great
My wife enjoyed the old time culture

name: Taco Del Mar
reviews: Food and service was great.
Create food and service.  Also are very active supporting the community
Yummy fish tacos every friday, thats my personal favorite but they have something for everyone! Super friendly service in store as well as on the phone! Definitely recommend this place to others!
Excellent food. Fast friendly service. Clean tables and floor. Great time, will go again.
Used to eat here all the time when I lived in town so I make a point to stop by when I have a chance. Huge portions and great ingredients!

name: Johnny Carino's
address: 1601 W Century Ave, Bismarck, ND 58503, USA
reviews: Service was fast. Food was hot when we got it.

Just a brief and sincere thanks to the staff at Carino's in Bismarck. Stopped in for a glass of wine and pasta meal. Ordered fettuccine with marinara and shrimp. Absolutely fantastic! Only to be surpassed by their service. Thanks Autumn along with all the service and management staff for paying attention to me during a "very trying day." I shall return!! Thanks again.

Just saw a post on social media on how your restaurant will be open while adhering to 'guidelines' during this pandemic. How absolutely unprofessional and profit driven. I feel so terrible for your employees, which I assume you won't be supporting.
Stopped in for dinner 01/18/20. Ordered the seafood fettuccine. Half the mussels were served unopened, and the calamari was overcooked. Flavors were good though and service was fine.

This is the place to dine on Monday night.  Exceptional value, family platters half price, a family can dine for less than $20!!! We had the spicy chicken romano,  it is tantalizing! Artichokes, mushrooms, sundried tomatoes, chicken with bow tie pasta.  Autumn was a fantastic server, very attentive she even had a table of ten, very impressive! Great food, great service at a unheard of price!  The patio is awesome. Jennee T has added some water fountains which is so serene.  The Italian nachos are a favorite of ours. Yummy!

name: Kroll's Diner
reviews: We ordered the meatloaf. It was horrible. Tasted like it was mostly filler with a funny texture. It was also cold. The mashed potatoes were cold. I had to pick through the salad. Our server was nice, but the food quality is very poor. Both of our meals were not good.

Knoephla soup was very good and fleischkuechle was pretty good too, but not five star.  I would repeat and try some of the other German specialty options.  Coffee was solid.  Waitress was nice.  Love the old time atmosphere also.  Wish I could give 4.5.

Not from around here so stopped in when staying and was very impressed!! Their menu selection is great. Their food is amazing. And had good service too!! If you’re looking for a quick, efficient, delicious, and comfortable feeling place to eat, go here!!!

Food 5/5 stars
Service 5/5 stars
5.99 daily special breakdown
I order 2 of the 5.99 daily specials with 2 ice waters, and the host explains to me that, the only way to get the "advertised 5.99 daily special, is that they need to add a $2.39 drink (ordered ice water) to each special. I feel like maybe they should add that info to the front sign. 2  of the 5.99 daily lunch specials and we will only add $4.78 plus tax to your meal. Should be advertised as the $8.38 + tax lunch deal.
I just stopped in for dessert but the service was great. Nice and  clean and fast. The banana split was good and even though I know its work to make it, the server was very nice.

name: QDOBA Mexican Eats
reviews: It’s QDOBA, nothing much to write home about, except we were here on a very cold January day here in Bismarck, ND and it was like they were against turning up the heat. The dining room was cold temperature wise.

Staff was great! I was THAT customer that came in like 10 minutes before closing and the food was still out ready to go and hot.
Portion sizes were on the small side compared to Chipotle though.
It's nice to order food just the way you like it.

Their system went offline today for about 20 min at the beginning of the lunch rush. The staff handled the situation very well and kept their good attitudes. 
Oh and my Chicken Naked Nachos were awesome!! I wish we'd have gotten a free drink or a small discount for the inconvenience. But, I do realize that decision wasn't theirs to make.
Great food and they offer a college student discount. A couple employees aren't very good to work with. But otherwise a good place to eat.

name: White House Cafeteria
address: 117 N 5th St A, Bismarck, ND 58501, USA
reviews: Excellent bagels! You can by them to take home (4 in a batch) or get them toasted with cream cheese to eat right there! Very pleasant ladies running this place. Scones were tender and moist, but I cannot rave enough about the bagels! I will be back for more!

One of those places you can drive by a hundred times and never know it's there!

Once you're in the White Drug Pharmacy, 117 N 5th, east side of the road just north of Main, head way to the back. Yeah, there's really a place to eat in here! Go on, past the counters, look for the big sign on the back wall- The White House- yeah right there, no really! Go back there, door on your right.

Take a peek at the Specials Board. Today, Wednesday, Sloppy Joe's was on the menu. So I had to order it, since I am really fond of, and I mean not in a brotherly way, FOND of Joe's. I was leaning towards the burger, which was a buck off today, but I'm really fond of Sloppy Joe's!

Got two on my plate, with some chips and pickle. The sauce was not tomato-y, but light, slightly sweet, and tangy. That's some good sauce, oh yeah. Served in a fluffy, soft, yeasty, home made bun. I didn't add anything to it, and it didn't need anything. Just naked and unafraid.

I was thinking of ordering two more, but I'll just back a few more times, now that I know there's really a cafeteria in that pharmacy!

Reasonably priced, daily specials, hot, fresh, and tasty! Go there, Missy will take care of you!
Tastes like home cooking. Wonderful service!

Homemade food the tater tot hot dish was good I was hungry and could of used a bigger portion but I eat alot. There is also baked goods made by Mark. Homemade goods there great also. I have no complaints about this place. One more thing you can sign up for texts and when you do sign up u get a free meal just for signing up. Now you can't beat that!!! So get on over to White house Cafeteria u can't go wrong.

Reminds me of the old KB's that was in Kirkwood mall years ago.
THEY USE REAL Potatoes, CHEESE BUTTONS ON FRIDAYS. Very Good. Clean Kitchen compared to many others in Bis-Man

name: Stadium Sports Bar
address: 1247 W Divide Ave, Bismarck, ND 58501, USA
reviews: Nice, friendly atmosphere. Service is good, drinks are good. It's wasy to walk around, play pool, or just hang out. I think I prefer this place to many others in town. It's very relaxed.
Ate on The Lodge side of the place. Staff was extremely friendly, attentive and considerate. Food was great. Cool place. Will return!
Love having lunch there. Friendly staff and quick service.
My Favorite Sports Bar. They're always kind and courteous.  Fast service and great food!
Super awesome experience bartender even experimented on a shot and give it to me for free and it was great. Ask for the liquid marijuana shot. Its great

name: Pancheros Mexican Grill
address: 1225 W Century Ave, Bismarck, ND 58503, USA
reviews: The first time we tried Pancheros the food was cold, I thought we would try it a second time. The coke was out so we thought we would let them know and the lady said it'll take about 20 minutes.... We went to go sit down to eat but couldn't find a clean table so we sat at a dirty one while I watched my husband eat his lunch,, it was cold again so again I didn't eat it. I do not recommend this place and customer service is terrible.
I was just passing thru town and stopped here, the guys working behind  the counter were super friendly and helpful. The food was fresh and flavorful and would eat here again.

food was good. service was kinda pushy tables were all dirty. and they had some of the warmers open when I was in line. absolutely disgusting. Does anyone in that place clean? only gave it a 2 star because the food was good.  
I wont be going back if that's the way the front is cleaned how bad is it in the back?

Just wanted to add that Pancheros Reached out to me and I am very happy about how they handled themselves. I will go there again. Knowing they took care of the issue.
Best burritos in town. Absolutely delicioso.

Just not as good as I remember. This used to be my favorite place!
It truely is lacking flavor. Everything was very blahh..NO bite striked me as "Mhmm this is good".
Guac is mushy because it has far too many tomatoes in it and completely ruins the consistency and taste.
The vegetables are over cooked and not seasoned/marinated like advertised.
I had to look into this but there is $1.10 difference in the meal I ordered vs. Qdoba and the difference is so worth it for so many reasons.

name: Denny's
reviews: Hamburgers are amazing, the Slamwich Sandwich is mouth watering!  Love the food here!

I had steak (t bone) eggs pancakes and hashbrown, it's was all tasty but my steak was dry, really thin, chewy. I complained and made me a new one and it was nice and juicy, second time around much better, thanks for fixing it. over all really good service.

Seen it on diner's drive ins n dives
So we try it n it was dam awesome

I love going into restaurants with my family and enjoy their company. Service has been good here. When you want to do pick up orders or to go orders it seems there is no appreciation for the customer. I have sent my Sons down to get me a simple order to enjoy in the convenience of my own home and fine dining and nothing was right or it seemed like the server putting it together didn’t care. I am very disappointed, the take out especially if the customer is picking up it should be just as good as the dine in experience as well as enjoying it else where. Get it together Denny’s!

The food at Denny's is always incredible. I ordered a very custom grand slam breakfast. I got exactly what I asked for perfectly cooked and everything tasted fantastic. I will most definitely be stopping here again.

name: Applebee's Grill + Bar
reviews: Chips were overcooked, or cooked in fry oil that needed to be changed. If I was the chef/cook or waiter I would not have served those chips. Chips are not meant to be a deep brown.

Food wasn't the greatest. But I have eaten at worst places. But one thing I can say is we had the best waiter EVER. I wish I could've remembered his name. He was a young man, about 21- no older then 25. Anyway we were there about 5. He went way out of his way to please us. I can honestly say the best I have had in a long while.

Horrible 
Ordered a taco salad. The meat was like cement and cold. Suppose to have beans on there were a couple. The lettuce was huge chunks.
Pick up was at 6:26 it was ten minutes late
Could of just as well went to taco johns or Taco Bell. Absolutely awful salad.
Good service, good food, was quite quiet at lunch time on a Tuesday. my husband was bothered by the cleaning supplies we were sat next to.
Food was great. Not so much the service. She should of worried about all her tables not just the two big tops she had

name: Burger Time
address: 1320 E Main Ave, Bismarck, ND 58501, USA
reviews: Mostly Because Their Is A Gentleman by the Name of Jim that Works So Very Hard to Please Us Customers. He works in the "Produce" Dept. & We Are ALWAYS greeted with a Smiling Face & Even if we have ?s about Another Area He Will Go Out of His Way to Find Someone to Help Us. Fabulous Worker & the Most Customer Friendly Worker in your Entire Store. TY for Hiring this Man. He's the Reason I Come Back.

I went through the  drive-up and ordered my food. A bacon cheeseburger and fries. They were very fast in getting my order ready. I traveled 5 minutes back to work to eat my lunch and it was already “warm” at best. The burger was dry and over cooked. The bun was a bit soggy and the fries were very bland. I may give this place one more chance but not likely. I think I can get a better burger elsewhere.

5 stars for what it is - a drive through burger joint. Best fast food burger in town by far.  I don’t eat there often because I like somewhere I can go in and sit down instead of always eating on the run, but man are they good!

rude service, refused walk ups to the window, and was told to use drive thru, while i dont have a car.  The drive thru and window are the same issue when it comes to ordering, handing money and getting food from the employees.  I brought my attention to other business who have let me use the drive thru in town to order food, and they even said Burger Time is being hypocritical on the issue.  I contacted the business on facebook, and was blocked afterwards.  I just sent a complaint to the Better Business Bureau regarding the issue, along with how they handle customer service.
Could have just spit in my food, since you obviously have no passion for the industry. My chili cheese dog needs an IV for dehydration.

name: Buffalo Wings & Rings
reviews: Night out with, just us ladies. Our lady server was great! The food was good! The coconut drink was good. The place seemed clean. It was nice to see it wasn't too busy and the place didn't lack culture. If you like my review please give me a thumbs up

If you go into this restaurant thinking it's like competition to Buffalo Wild Wings you'd be right. Here is the thing it has better wings like good meat in them. I had the boneless and it was like the breast meat now the worst meat in the bird like most places. I think it is better than Buffalo wild wings and less busy with a good amount of TVs to watch whatever you're into.
Fresh crispy large pieces of chicken. We like to get the 20 piece boneless with 4 different sauces
Was excellent when it first opened, but now is no where near. I used to think the wings were the best in town. Now they taste a bit chewy and dry. My burger was pretty bland as well.
I tried this place instead of going to Buffalo Wild Wings and I really do think the food was way better.  The staff were so nice and I was just all around pleased.  I will go back!

name: Kroll's Diner
address: 1915 E Main Ave, Bismarck, ND 58501, USA
reviews: Great, simple breakfast food at a reasonable price. Service can be a bit slow at times.

I haven't been there in 15 years. Nothing inside appears to have changed much. The food quality has improved from what I remember. I we there for breakfast we ordered 3 different meals all delicious. 
Good job.
They call themselves Chermans??? The flieschkeukla was substandard to those west of the Missouri river and don't get me started on the weird lumpy yellow soup, that was not knephla!!

Good food, 
Mediocre cleanliness
Poor service.
Great breakfast selection.
